mapper.insert: insert into patient (preportTime, preportTel, plocation, pname, psymptom, psex, page, pbloodType, pcarAssign) values(#{preportTime}, #{preportTel}, #{plocation}, #{pname}, #{psymptom}, #{psex}, #{page}, #{pbloodType}, #{pcarAssign})
mapper.select: select count(*) from patient where pcarAssign=#{pcarAssign}
mapper.update: update patient set pcarAssign=#{pcarAssign} where pno=#{pno}
